snippet.title: Mafia 2 - HD video game teaser trailer - PS3 X360 PC
snippet.description: http://www.gamezplay.org - From the developers of the award-winning Mafia comes Mafia II, a beautifully crafted look into the dark and unforgiving world of the Mob. Expanding upon the original hit that captivated more than 2 million gamers around the world, 2K Czech takes players deeper into the Mafia with a mature and exciting experience that will immerse players like never before. More on my blog http://gamezplay.org
